ygData.msgSnippet: ... Fwah kah!!!! Jeweller making quite a lot of coin then, unless he failed alot. If he failed alot, then he shouldn t wasting all that black pearl... FYI, one
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>

> I don't know about the rich part. just found out that I have to pay
> 1kpp for 1 plus 6 agi and dex ring......

Fwah kah!!!! Jeweller making quite a lot of coin then, unless he
failed alot. If he failed alot, then he shouldn't wasting all that black
pearl...

FYI, one bar of platinum costs about 110 platinum coins, if you
have high CHA. Buying a black pearl off a vendor will set you back
21 plat. Of course, it's hard to find vendors selling black pearl. *heh*

These are the only 2 things required to make an enchanted
Platinum Black Pearl Ring +6 DEX +6 AGI, besides a high
jewelcraft skill, that is.


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
